channel.title: Sony Hack
channel.description:
Recently Sony Pictures was the victim of a massive network attack. Massive amounts of intellectual property and business secrets were stolen and dumped online. The attack was claimed by the "GOP" - Guardians of Peace.
Do you think North Korea was behind the attack? Do you think Sony Pictures can recover from the attack?
I have put together a small presentation, including an overview of the data that was dumped and some technical analysis of the attack vectors:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YWWXXLV5WRU
